This may be the worst excuse for a shooting game i've ever seen.. as a firearm enthusiast and gun nut, this is painful to play. Bullets dissapear as you watch their trajectory, guns don't shoot where you aim them 85% of the time, you cant limit the FPS to improve performance and gameplay, there's no rewards or progression without spending real money to open cases and gamble, and you cant aim down sights unless using a scope or optic, and even then bullets still don't hit where they should... if you want to rage, enjoy this "entertainment"
